pages.text: $(li)Shoebills are passive birds that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/swamp/swamp)Swamps$(/l).$(br)$(li)These creatures sometimes stand in the water, and fish for fish.$(br)$(li)Shoebills can be feed up to 10 $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/emu_egg)Emu Eggs$(/l) to increase their lunk or 10 $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/crocodile_egg)Crocodile Eggs$(/l) to increase their lure to improve their fishing.
They like to hunt baby Turtles, and baby Crocodiles, as well as most fish.
